Born in The Netherlands, 1998. From a young age Jesper Seipenbusch has been fascinated by new technologies and media. He decided to follow in the footsteps of his brother and has been a graduated Allround-Digital Publisher since 2017. As he is currently studying Game-Development he recently realized that he was missing graphic design, but did not want to give up on programming. He found that focussing on Front-end web development might just be the solution for him. From this point onwards his journey has yet to be experiencedâ€¦
